Genome.description: String indicating the name of the genome assembly

TxDb.description: String of existing TxDb package name or a TxDb object

OrgDb.description: String of the desired OrgDb package name

gene.id.column.description: String of the TxDb column name that refers tothe given TxDb gene IDs.Default value is \code{gene.id.column = "ENTREZID"}

display.column.description: String of the OrgDb column name that refers tothe type of gene symbol to be displayed in plots.Default value is \code{display.column = "SYMBOL"}

BSgenome.description: String of the desired BSgenome package name
